title: My Summoner Level Has Not Been Updated on the Forums.
body: My Summoner Level on my Boards Profile shows up as Level 3. Please Update this for me. And for everyone else. No one should ever have to e-mail you about this again. It is a KNOWN issue. Fix it Rito.

replies.body: Thank you for fixing that so quickly.
Actually, it still isn't fixed. I'm still getting the error DESPITE my boards profile now saying I am level 30.
